docs.text: MkDocs Wordart A MkDocs plugin that makes wordart available again. rainbow rainbow green-marble green-marble horizon horizon blues blues sunset sunset superhero superhero graydient graydient outline outline italic-outline italic-outline slate slate radial radial paper-bag paper-bag chrome chrome up up purple purple marble-slab marble-slab mauve mauve tilt tilt yellow-dash yellow-dash gray-block gray-block aqua aqua red-blue red-blue basic-stack basic-stack brown-stack brown-stack texture-stack texture-stack green-stack green-stack stack-3d stack-3d
docs.title: MkDocs Wordart

docs.text: A MkDocs plugin that makes wordart available again.
docs.title: MkDocs Wordart

docs.text: How to use it To use this beautiful plugin, you just have to put this MarkDown inside your docs : ```wordart { "style": "rainbow", "text": "rainbow", "size": 70 } ``` style : the style you want for your WordArt. All avaible styles : rainbow green-marble horizon blues sunset superhero graydient outline italic-outline slate radial paper-bag chrome up purple marble-slab mauve tilt yellow-dash gray-block aqua red-blue basic-stack brown-stack texture-stack green-stack stack-3d text : The text you want to display size : Size of the Word, default is 50.
docs.title: How to use it
